# Take Aways

- Use the `<-` operator to assign the result of an operation to a variable
- Functions get called in R in the form `<FUNCTION_NAME>(<ARGUMENTS>)`
- Arguments can be specified by position or by name, and are separated by a comma `,`.
- Many functions in R operate on vectors
